ComicInfo.Summary:
**MINISERIES PREMIERE**
THE BIGGEST NAMES IN COMICS RESURRECT THE MOST ICONIC MONSTERS!
THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH creators JAMES TYNION IV (**W0RLDTR33, _Something is Killing the Children_**) and **MARTIN SIMMONDS** reteam to tell a new tale of the monster who started it all!
When Dr. John Seward admits a strange new patient into his asylum, the madman tells stories of a demon who has taken residence next door. But as Dr. Seward attempts to apply logic to the impossibleâ€¦his surrogate daughter Lucy begins to fall under the spell of the twisted _Count Dracula_!

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew K. Currey,Gabriel Rodriguez,Jakub Rebelka,Joshua Middleton,Martin Simmonds,Michael Walsh,Nimit Malavia,Skottie Young,Tonci Zonjic,Tula Lotay
